file.title: Cursor

p.text: It is a symbol the mouse pointer is changed to when it is moved over the object.

p.textAll: Every cursor symbol has its own name. All cursor names you can find in Quick fill words -> Cursors

sample.sampletitle: Variants of how a cursor can be set (after it has been moved over a button):
sample.samplecode: Window1.Button1.Cursor = "Pan North" Window1.Button1.Cursor = Hand Window1.Button1.Cursor = Window1.Window1.Cursor Window1.Button1.Cursor = Window1.Text1.Text
